agentDescription: Operational excellence assessment. Use this when task intent aligns with tags: strategic, operations. Use this construction when an agent task matches operational excellence workflows and the team needs a repeatable, typed analysis contract. It cannot replace full runtime verification and does not guarantee correctness outside the provided input and capability constraints.
